description:
The course with valuable knowledge will help you to create simple vector art for web and applications.

I'd love to share my easy method to draw pictures by hand and convert this into vector graphic by using Photoshop and Illustrator. I use the method to draw icons, design elements and even children books. It is absolutely easy, quick and suitable for everyone.

Suitable for everyone

For applying this course you do not need any skills and knowledges in drawing by hand. You don't need to be familiar with Photoshop and Illustrator. We will learn a needed tools step by step.

My course four parts:

- Drawing by hand

I will give you some advice how to start drawing and find your style. I will share my observations in choosing right pen or pencil for drawing. I'll also show you how to get quality digital copies of drawings.

- Processing in Photoshop

With these part of lessons you will learn a needed tools to process image and cut out needed elements.

- Turning into vector in Illustrator

You will know how to convert drawings into vector graphic and edit vector art.

- Prepare your vector art

You will learn how to edit vector graphic.

Two bonus lectures

As bonus I will show you how to re-size and re-shape your hand-drawn elements. And some more lecture is about reducing extra points in vector shapes.

How to get Photoshop and Illustrator

There is special lesson for them who haven't yet got Photoshop and Illustrator to their computer. From this lesson you can get full information where and how to download and install these programs, and then get free trial.

What kind of skills will you gain?

Having passed my course you will know how to start drawing by hand, how to use Photoshop and Illustrator and how to turn a hand-drawn design into vector art
title: How to Make a Custom Graphic From Sketches
